alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Fairfield; Kershaw; Northern Lancaster; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 4:20PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Fairfield, Lancaster, northwestern Chesterfield and northwestern Kershaw Counties through 445 PM EST... At 419 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mineral Springs to near Fort Lawn. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Springdale, Kershaw, Elgin, Heath Springs, USC Lancaster, Irwin, Liberty Hill, Andrew Jackson State Park, Buford, Fishing Creek Reservoir, Jefferson, Arrowood Estates, Bell Town Fire Station, Faith Christian School, Bear Creek Park, McDonald Green Elementary School, High Point Fire Station, Tradesville, and Camp Creek Fire Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield; Fairfield; Kershaw; Northern Lancaster; Southern Lancaster
